name: Trials of Midnight
description:
In this board-based deckbuilder roguelike, take on the role of Midnight, a lost nightmare trying to escape a child's dream world. With nightmare minions at your disposal, battle your way through legions of dream protectors!

Developed by Team Chiffon for the MassDiGI Summer 2021 Innovation Program.

  • Courtney Manbeck: Programmer & Designer
  • Dylan Valev: Programmer & Producer
  • Justin Gaborit: Programmer
  • Frank Liu: Artist
  • Fergus Ferguson: Artist
  • Mac Li: Artist
  • Calvin Tillman: Music & SFX
